high_descs: Walk forward to the desk and then make a right. Walk to the dresser and turn left to face it.
Pick up the text book from the dresser.
Turn to the left and walk forward to the other side table. Turn right to face it.
anns.task_desc: Use a text book to turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Walk straight to the desk then turn right move forward slightly then face left at the desk
Pick up the book from the desk
Turn around and move forward slightly then turn right and walk straight then face right at the table with a lamp
Turn on the lamp while holding the book
anns.task_desc: Turning on a lamp with a book

high_descs: Head forward to the desk in front you, take a step to the right and continue to face the desk
Pick up the book that is sitting on the desk above the keys
Turn to your left head to the white stand across the room, hang right one you past the desk and stand in front of the table that is sitting to the left of the desk
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the table.
anns.task_desc: Read a book by the light of a lamp
